rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall featuring Art Deco detailing and a reception counter for visitors.
An open-plan living room integrated with the kitchen. Features high ceilings, decorative moldings, and natural light from large windows.
Modern open kitchen featuring Art Deco inspired cabinetry and state-of-the-art appliances. Seamlessly connects to the living area.
A small utility room for storage of cleaning supplies and other essentials.
Guest bedroom with a spacious balcony adhering to Vastu principles for positive energy flow. Incorporates Art Deco decorative elements in the window frames and fixtures.

openings.description: Main entrance door located on the eastern side to invite positive energy as per Vastu Shastra. Features Art Deco detailing.
Large windows along the south and east walls to ensure ample natural light and maintain energy flow.
